name: Project: Gorgon \u2013 An Indie MMORPG by Industry Veterans
blurb: An indie MMORPG with the deep gameplay of the classics, all the features of a modern game, and a unique immersive feel.

rewards.reward: You\u2019ll have access to the beta in Fall of next year (and alpha as slots are available), as well as 3 months of Gold level game access after launch. [See FAQ for details.] \r\nPlus, your name will appear in the credits along with our most sincere thanks.

In addition to the above rewards, you\u2019ll also receive beta access for a friend and an additional 3 months of Gold level game access \u2013 which you can share with that friend or selfishly keep to yourself. \r\nPlus all of your characters from now to eternity will receive an exclusive title (\u201cSponsor\u201d) and the ability to use two special emotes: /ymca and /atoyot.

In addition to all the above rewards, all of your characters will receive a second exclusive title (\u201cPatron\u201d) and a special \u201cPatron\u2019s Hat.\u201d You can also reserve your character\u2019s name for use after launch. \r\nPlus, you will be able to download a digital copy of the Project: Gorgon soundtrack by Conor Brace!

In addition to all the above rewards, you can reserve an additional character name (for a total of two). 
All of your characters will receive a pair of exclusive "Journeyman's Boots". 
And your account will get two vials of wolf spit - we'll hopefully find a better name for it - which can be drunk by a character to instantly become infected with lycanthropy, thus skipping a quest that normally takes two months in real time. (You have to wait for the full moon, you know.) You can use the wolf spit yourself and/or give it to a friend. (The wolf spit is a per-account reward, not a per-character reward: two delicious wolf spit per backer.) 
Finally, you will have a vote on what gets added to the game during beta and shortly after the game ships.

In addition to all the above rewards, all of your characters will receive an exclusive item that triggers a special graphical effect, such as fireworks or a blast of rainbow power. (We\u2019ll work with the artists we hire to make sure it\u2019s a cool effect.)\r\nAll of your characters will also start the game with the Advanced Portal Magic skill and the very rare spell \u201cPortal to AB\u201d.\r\nPlus, we will add your favorite food into the game with your name on it (for example, Bob\u2019s Bacon-Wrapped Shrimp) \u2013 even if we have to adjust the rest of the game a little (such as adding shrimp!) in order to manage it. The recipe for your food will drop as rare loot, but you will receive a stack of 10 copies of the recipe to use or hand out to your friends. (The stack of recipes a per-account reward, not a per-character reward. One stack per backer.)

In addition to all the above rewards, all of your characters will have access to a special werewolf beast-form appearance \u2013 assuming that the character is a werewolf, of course.\r\nYou will also receive an official Certificate of Appreciation \u2013 a real item, suitable for framing. The certificate also contains a unique top-tier Word of Power that can be used in-game exactly once. \r\nPlus, send us a name and brief description for an NPC and we will add it to the game as a friendly townsfolk, shopkeeper, or evil boss (your choice).

In addition to all the above rewards, you get to create a custom title just for you and your friends. You will be able to bestow this title on anyone you like.\r\nYou can also customize one of the Points of Interest in the game \u2013 such as a shrine or waterfall \u2013 with a name, a simple inscription, and so forth.\r\nFinally, town NPC chatter will include references to you and your exploits. (You give us details about what you want and we\u2019ll write the dialog with your help.)

In addition to all the above rewards, you will have access to a few fun \u2018admin\u2019 commands, including /smite \u2013 which kills another player instantly \u2013 once per week, /fanfare \u2013 which announces your presence to the entire server \u2013 once per day, and a few other commands that create fun illusions and conjure minor trinkets. (Remember, this is a PvE game, so smiting other people doesn\u2019t give you any real advantage ... although it can be very funny.)\r\nYou also get a 15 minute phone call with us in which you can suggest anything you want for the game and we promise to seriously consider it \u2013 especially if it\u2019s easy to code. You are also welcome to ask us questions, tell us about your cats, etc. (Backers in the Central Florida, USA area are welcome to meet us for coffee instead.)\r\nPlus, you get to design a weapon, named after you and using unique art, which will become a rare loot drop. (We\u2019ll decide the item's stats and art based on your input.)

In addition to all the rewards above, you can choose to revive one of the skill sets that was cut from launch: Were-Tiger, Demonologist, Psi Dominator, or Dark Geologist. Each of these skill sets has several complementary skills, plus a unique fighting style. For the first 6 months after launch, you and you alone will decide who gets to have this skill. (Or if you prefer, it can just be accessible to all players. But that\u2019s boring.) \r\nAnd finally, we will create a town crier NPC to sing your praises \u2026 in a town named after you.
